TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Of note: the concentration of matter on this island is significantly weaker than recorded on previous visits.. What has happened?
CASSAVA: This is highly noteworthy. Potential method of neutralizing matter long-term? To do: check on concentration on other islands for control comparison.
CASSAVA: An update: concentration on the forested cliffs of Statue Island appears to have also greatly diminished, though that of the other islands have not.
CASSAVA: Are there any notable properties shared by these two islands? Further investigation needed.
CASSAVA: Could large populations of <color=orange>plantlife</color> on these two islands be the cause of these lower concentrations of matter?
CASSAVA: Though I had noted their immunity against the matter, if plantlife might also have an affinity for absorbing and neutralizing the matter, this could be a groundbreaking discovery...
CASSAVA: Hypothesis: a voyage to <color=orange>Timber Hearth</color> will be able to prove the validity of this theory.
